guides.title: Guides
guides.welcome: InnovArt Guides Page of Mastering Design Tools
guides.description: Welcome to InnovArt's Guides, your comprehensive guides to mastering various design tools. Our guides offer step-by-step guidance and practical projects to enhance your learning experience. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your expertise, our guides provide the knowledge and resources you need.

adobe_illustrator.title: Adobe Illustrator Guide
adobe_illustrator.description: Begin your journey with typography. Learn the essentials, from understanding typefaces and fonts to advanced techniques like kerning and typography hierarchy. Apply your skills with practical projects.

adobe_photoshop.title: Adobe Photoshop Guide
adobe_photoshop.description: Unlock your creativity with our Illustration Roadmap. Learn basic sketching to digital illustration, explore various styles, and work on projects to develop your unique artistic voice.

adobe_animate.title: Adobe Animate Guide
adobe_animate.description: Step into 3D design. Learn principles of 3D modeling, texturing, and rendering using industry-standard software. Tackle projects that simulate real-world design challenges.

adobe_after_effects.title: Adobe After Effects Guide
adobe_after_effects.description: Bring your ideas to life with animation. Whether 2D, 3D, or stop-motion, learn animation principles and techniques through tutorials and hands-on projects.

adobe_xd.title: Adobe XD Guide
adobe_xd.description: Refine your editing skills. Learn tools and techniques for video and photo editing using software like Adobe Premiere Pro and Photoshop. Work on projects to enhance your capabilities.

canva.title: Canva Guide
canva.description: Refine your editing skills. Learn tools and techniques for video and photo editing using software like Adobe Premiere Pro and Photoshop. Work on projects to enhance your capabilities.

spline.title: Spline Guide
spline.description: Refine your editing skills. Learn tools and techniques for video and photo editing using software like Adobe Premiere Pro and Photoshop. Work on projects to enhance your capabilities.

procreate.title: Procreate Guide
procreate.description: Refine your editing skills. Learn tools and techniques for video and photo editing using software like Adobe Premiere Pro and Photoshop. Work on projects to enhance your capabilities.

procreate_dreams.title: Procreate Dreams Guide
procreate_dreams.description: Refine your editing skills. Learn tools and techniques for video and photo editing using software like Adobe Premiere Pro and Photoshop. Work on projects to enhance your capabilities.

figma.title: Figma Guide
figma.description: Refine your editing skills. Learn tools and techniques for video and photo editing using software like Adobe Premiere Pro and Photoshop. Work on projects to enhance your capabilities.

adobe-animate.title: Your Guide to Adobe Animate
adobe-animate.description: Step into 3D design. Learn principles of 3D modeling, texturing, and rendering using industry-standard software. Tackle projects that simulate real-world design challenges.

content.title: Introduction to Adobe Animate
content.description: Adobe Animate is a versatile tool that allows you to create interactive animations for web, games, and TV shows. It’s ideal for creating 2D animations and interactive content.

content.title: Creating a New Project
content.description: Open Adobe Animate and select 'File > New'. Choose a canvas size and frame rate suitable for your project. Click 'Create' to open a new project.

content.title: Drawing Tools
content.description: Select and manipulate objects with the Selection Tool. Draw with the Brush Tool, and create shapes with the Rectangle Tool.

content.title: Creating Simple Animations
content.description: Learn the basics of creating frame-by-frame animations and using the timeline to animate objects.

content.title: Try it Out
content.description: Follow these steps to create a simple ball animation: Draw a circle using the Brush Tool, add keyframes on the timeline, move the circle, and create a motion tween.

figma.title: Your Guide to Figma
figma.description: Refine your editing skills. Learn tools and techniques for video and photo editing using software like Adobe Premiere Pro and Photoshop. Work on projects to enhance your capabilities.

content.title: Introduction to Figma
content.description: Figma is a versatile tool that allows you to design and prototype user experiences for web and mobile applications. It’s ideal for creating wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes.

content.title: Creating a New Project
content.description: Open Figma and select 'File > New'. Choose a device size and orientation suitable for your project. Click 'Create' to open a new project.

content.title: Design Tools
content.description: Use the Rectangle, Ellipse, and Polygon tools to create shapes. Use the Text tool to add and style text.

content.title: Creating Prototypes
content.description: Learn how to create interactive prototypes by linking frames and adding transitions. Use the Preview panel to test your prototypes.

content.title: Try it Out
content.description: Follow these steps to create a simple interactive prototype: Create multiple frames, add elements to each frame, and link the frames to create navigation.

adobe-photoshop.title: Adobe Photoshop Guide
adobe-photoshop.description: Welcome to the Adobe Photoshop Guide! This guide will help you get started with Adobe Photoshop, a powerful tool for editing photos and creating digital artwork. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your skills, this guide covers the basics to set you on the right path.

content.title: Introduction to Adobe Photoshop
content.description: Adobe Photoshop is a versatile software that allows you to edit and manipulate images. It offers a wide range of tools and features for enhancing photos and creating stunning visual effects.

content.title: Opening an Image
content.description: To start editing an image in Adobe Photoshop, go to 'File > Open' and select the image file you want to work with. The image will open in the Photoshop workspace.

content.title: Selection Tools
content.description: Use the Selection Tools to select specific areas of an image for editing. The Marquee Tool, Lasso Tool, and Magic Wand Tool are commonly used selection tools.

content.title: Adjustment Tools
content.description: Adjustment Tools allow you to modify the colors, tones, and other attributes of an image. The Levels, Curves, and Hue/Saturation tools are commonly used adjustment tools.

content.title: Try it Out
content.description: Follow these steps to enhance an image: Use the Lasso Tool to select an object, apply the Levels adjustment to adjust the brightness and contrast, and use the Brush Tool to remove imperfections.

adobe-illustrator.title: Adobe Illustrator Guide
adobe-illustrator.description: Begin your journey with typography. Learn the essentials, from understanding typefaces and fonts to advanced techniques like kerning and typography hierarchy. Apply your skills with practical projects.

content.title: Introduction to Adobe Illustrator
content.description: Adobe Illustrator is a powerful vector graphics editor that allows you to create and manipulate digital illustrations. It offers a wide range of tools and features for creating artwork, logos, icons, and more.

content.title: Creating a New Document
content.description: To start a new project in Adobe Illustrator, go to 'File > New'. Choose the document size and settings suitable for your project. Click 'Create' to open a new document.

content.title: Drawing Tools
content.description: Use the Pen Tool, Shape Tools, and Line Tools to create and modify shapes and paths in Adobe Illustrator.

content.title: Working with Anchor Points
content.description: Learn how to manipulate anchor points and handles to control the shape and curvature of paths.

content.title: Try it Out
content.description: Follow these steps to create a simple logo: Use the Pen Tool to draw a shape, adjust the anchor points to refine the shape, and apply colors and effects to enhance the design.

after-effects.title: Adobe After Effects Guide
after-effects.description: Bring your ideas to life with animation. Whether 2D, 3D, or stop-motion, learn animation principles and techniques through tutorials and hands-on projects.

sections.title: 1. Getting Started with Adobe After Effects

content.title: Introduction to Adobe After Effects
content.description: Adobe After Effects is a powerful software for creating motion graphics and visual effects. It allows you to combine videos, images, and animations to create stunning visual compositions.

content.title: Creating a New Composition
content.description: To start a new project in Adobe After Effects, go to 'File > New > Composition'. Choose the composition settings suitable for your project. Click 'OK' to create a new composition.

content.title: Layers in After Effects
content.description: Learn how to work with layers in Adobe After Effects. Layers are the building blocks of your composition and can contain videos, images, text, and effects.

content.title: Animating with Keyframes
content.description: Keyframes are used to create animation in After Effects. Learn how to set keyframes and manipulate properties over time to create dynamic animations.

content.title: Try it Out
content.description: Follow these steps to create a simple animation: Import an image or video, create keyframes to animate its position or scale, and preview the animation.

adobe-xd.title: Adobe XD Guide
adobe-xd.description: Explore the world of user experience design. Learn how to create interactive prototypes, wireframes, and design systems using Adobe XD. Develop your skills through hands-on projects and real-world design challenges.

content.title: Introduction to Adobe XD
content.description: Adobe XD is a powerful design and prototyping tool that allows you to create user interfaces for web and mobile applications. It offers a range of features for designing layouts, creating interactive elements, and collaborating with team members.

content.title: Creating a New Project
content.description: To start a new project in Adobe XD, open the application and select 'File > New'. Choose the artboard size and settings suitable for your project. Click 'Create' to open a new project.

content.title: Design Tools
content.description: Use the Rectangle, Ellipse, and Text tools to create and style elements in Adobe XD. Apply colors, gradients, and effects to enhance the visual appearance of your designs.

content.title: Creating Interactive Prototypes
content.description: Learn how to create interactive prototypes in Adobe XD by adding links, transitions, and animations to your designs. Use the Preview mode to test and refine your prototypes.

content.title: Try it Out
content.description: Follow these steps to create a simple interactive prototype: Design a login screen with input fields and buttons, add transitions between screens, and simulate user interactions.

canva.title: Canva Guide
canva.description: Welcome to the Canva Guide! This guide will help you get started with Canva, a powerful online design tool that allows you to create stunning graphics, presentations, and more. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced designer, this guide covers the basics to help you unleash your creativity.

content.title: Introduction to Canva
content.description: Canva is a user-friendly design platform that offers a wide range of templates, images, and tools to create professional-looking designs. It's perfect for creating social media graphics, presentations, posters, and more.

content.title: Creating a New Design
content.description: To start a new design in Canva, sign in to your account and click on 'Create a design'. Choose a template or select custom dimensions for your design. Click 'Create' to open a new design.

content.title: Using Templates
content.description: Canva offers a wide range of templates for various design categories. Browse through the template library and customize them with your own content, colors, and fonts.

content.title: Adding Elements
content.description: Enhance your design by adding elements such as text, shapes, icons, and images. Canva provides a vast collection of elements that you can easily drag and drop onto your design.

content.title: Collaborating with Others
content.description: Invite team members or clients to collaborate on your Canva designs. Share your designs with others, allow them to make edits, and leave comments for seamless collaboration.

procreate-dreams.title: Procreate Dreams Guide
procreate-dreams.description: Unleash your creativity with Procreate Dreams. Learn how to create mesmerizing animations, motion graphics, and visual effects using the powerful features and tools of Procreate Dreams. From frame-by-frame animation to advanced effects, this guide will help you master the art of digital animation.

content.title: Introduction to Procreate Dreams
content.description: Procreate Dreams is a cutting-edge animation software that allows you to bring your imagination to life. With its intuitive interface and extensive animation tools, you can create stunning animations and visual effects with ease.

content.title: Creating a New Animation
content.description: To start a new animation project in Procreate Dreams, open the app and tap on the '+' button. Choose the canvas size, frame rate, and other settings suitable for your project. Tap 'Create' to open a new animation canvas.

content.title: Frame-by-Frame Animation
content.description: Learn how to create frame-by-frame animations in Procreate Dreams. Use the drawing tools and onion skinning feature to animate each frame and bring your characters and objects to life.

content.title: Animating with Keyframes
content.description: Keyframes are essential for creating smooth and dynamic animations in Procreate Dreams. Discover how to set keyframes, adjust timing and easing, and create complex motion paths for your animated elements.

content.title: Adding Visual Effects
content.description: Enhance your animations with stunning visual effects in Procreate Dreams. Explore the wide range of effects and filters available, and learn how to apply them to your animation to create captivating and eye-catching visuals.

spline.title: Spline Guide
spline.description: Learn how to create smooth and curved lines with splines. Master the techniques of spline interpolation and manipulation to create visually appealing and realistic curves in your designs.

content.title: What are Splines?
content.description: Splines are mathematical curves that are used to represent smooth and continuous shapes. They are widely used in computer graphics, animation, and design to create curves with precise control over their shape and smoothness.

content.title: Types of Splines
content.description: There are various types of splines, including B-splines, NURBS (Non-Uniform Rational B-Splines), and Bezier curves. Each type has its own characteristics and is suitable for different applications.

content.title: Creating Splines
content.description: Learn how to create splines using different tools and techniques. Whether you're using a vector graphics software or a programming library, discover the methods to create splines with precision and control.

content.title: Editing Splines
content.description: Master the art of manipulating splines to achieve the desired shape and curvature. Explore techniques such as adding and removing control points, adjusting handles, and applying smoothness modifiers.

content.title: Interpolating Splines
content.description: Discover the process of interpolating splines to create smooth and continuous curves between given points. Learn about interpolation methods such as Catmull-Rom splines and Hermite splines.

content.title: Spline Animation
content.description: Take your splines to the next level by animating them. Learn how to animate splines to create dynamic and fluid motion in your designs and animations.

content.title: Spline Extrusion
content.description: Explore the technique of extruding splines to give them depth and volume. Discover how to create 3D shapes and objects by extruding splines along a path.

content.title: Spline Rendering
content.description: Learn about different rendering techniques for splines. Whether you're rendering splines in real-time or for offline rendering, discover the methods to achieve high-quality and realistic results.

procreate.title: Procreate Guide
procreate.description: Welcome to the Procreate Guide! This guide will help you unleash your creativity with Procreate, a powerful digital painting and illustration app for iPad. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced artist, this guide covers everything you need to know to create stunning artworks using Procreate's extensive features and tools.

content.title: Introduction to Procreate
content.description: Procreate is a versatile and intuitive app that allows you to create digital artworks with ease. Learn about the main features and tools of Procreate, and get familiar with the interface to start your artistic journey.

content.title: Creating a New Canvas
content.description: To start a new artwork in Procreate, open the app and tap on the '+' button. Choose the canvas size, resolution, and orientation suitable for your project. Tap 'Create' to open a new canvas.

content.title: Brushes and Painting
content.description: Discover Procreate's extensive collection of brushes and learn how to use them to create beautiful digital paintings. Explore different brush settings, textures, and blending modes to achieve the desired effects in your artworks.

content.title: Layers and Blending Modes
content.description: Learn how to work with layers in Procreate to organize your artwork and apply various effects. Experiment with different blending modes to create interesting compositions and add depth to your paintings.

content.title: Selections and Transformations
content.description: Master the art of making selections and applying transformations in Procreate. Use selection tools to isolate parts of your artwork and apply transformations like scaling, rotating, and distorting to create dynamic compositions.

content.title: Digital Illustration
content.description: Explore advanced techniques for digital illustration in Procreate. Learn how to create detailed line art, add shading and highlights, and use advanced features like symmetry and perspective to enhance your illustrations.

content.title: Text and Typography
content.description: Discover how to incorporate text and typography into your artworks in Procreate. Learn about different text tools, formatting options, and creative ways to integrate text with your illustrations.

content.title: Animation and Time-lapse
content.description: Take your artworks to the next level by adding animation and creating time-lapse videos in Procreate. Learn how to animate your illustrations, create smooth transitions, and export your animations for sharing.

color_palettes.title: Color Palettes
color_palettes.description: Grab some inspiration from these color schemes
color_palettes.instruction: Click on a color to copy it to the clipboard.

icons.title: Icons
icons.description: Have access to SVGs of the most used icons
icons.instruction: Click on an icon to copy its SVG code to the clipboard.

header.title: Discover our Community's Work
header.description: InnovArt is the place destination to find & showcase creative work and home to the best design guides.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: Have any questions, feel free to contact us!
contactUs.getBack: We will get back to you shortly!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Reach out to our design team!
faq.uploadQuestion: How do I upload my own art?
faq.uploadAnswer: To upload your own art, navigate to the 'Upload' section, click on the 'Choose File' button, select your artwork, and hit 'Submit'. Ensure your file is in an acceptable format like .jpg, .png, or .svg.
faq.checkReviewsQuestion: How do I check my reviews on the art?
faq.checkReviewsAnswer: You can check your reviews by going to your profile page and clicking on the 'Reviews' tab. Here, you'll find all the feedback left by other users on your uploaded artworks.
faq.giveReviewQuestion: How do I give a review?
faq.giveReviewAnswer: To give a review, visit the artwork you want to review, scroll down to the 'Reviews' section, and click on 'Add Review'. Write your thoughts and hit 'Submit'.
faq.roadmapsLevelQuestion: Are all the roadmaps for the same level?
faq.roadmapsLevelAnswer: No, our roadmaps are tailored for different levels, from beginners to advanced users. Each roadmap clearly indicates the required skill level.
faq.roadmapDurationQuestion: How long does a roadmap take?
faq.roadmapDurationAnswer: The duration of a roadmap varies depending on its complexity and your pace. On average, a roadmap can take anywhere from a few weeks to a few months to complete.
faq.designPortfolioQuestion: Is there a way to design my portfolio?
faq.designPortfolioAnswer: Yes, our platform offers a 'Portfolio Builder' feature that helps you organize and showcase your artwork professionally. You can add, remove, and rearrange pieces easily.
faq.moreTipsQuestion: Are there more tips on the art?
faq.moreTipsAnswer: Absolutely! Each guide and tutorial comes with additional tips and tricks to help you improve your skills. Check out the 'Tips' section in each guide.
faq.newGuidesQuestion: When will there be new guides?
faq.newGuidesAnswer: We release new guides on a monthly basis. Stay tuned to our 'Updates' section or subscribe to our newsletter to get notified about new releases.

home.title: Welcome to InnovArt Roadmaps
home.description: Welcome to InnovArt's Roadmaps, your comprehensive guides to mastering various design disciplines. Our roadmaps offer step-by-step guidance and practical projects to enhance your learning experience. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your expertise, our roadmaps provide the knowledge and resources you need.

typography.title: Typography Roadmap
typography.description: Begin your journey with typography. Learn the essentials, from understanding typefaces and fonts to advanced techniques like kerning and typography hierarchy. Apply your skills with practical projects.

illustration.title: Illustration Roadmap
illustration.description: Unlock your creativity with our Illustration Roadmap. Learn basic sketching to digital illustration, explore various styles, and work on projects to develop your unique artistic voice.

design.title: 3D Design Roadmap
design.description: Step into 3D design. Learn principles of 3D modeling, texturing, and rendering using industry-standard software. Tackle projects that simulate real-world design challenges.

animation.title: Animation Roadmap
animation.description: Bring your ideas to life with animation. Whether 2D, 3D, or stop-motion, learn animation principles and techniques through tutorials and hands-on projects.

web.title: Web Roadmap
web.description: Refine your web development skills. Learn tools and techniques for front-end and back-end development, UX/UI design, and more. Work on projects to enhance your capabilities.

animation.title: 2D Animation Roadmap
animation.description: Welcome to the Animation Roadmap! This guide will take you through the essentials of animation, from basic principles to advanced techniques. You’ll learn to create captivating animations, whether you’re interested in 2D, 3D, or stop-motion. Each section includes recommended tools and sources of inspiration to help you along your journey.

content.title: Principles of Animation
content.description: Learn the 12 principles of animation, such as Squash and Stretch, Anticipation, Staging, and more. These principles will help you create more dynamic and believable animations.

content.title: Frame Rate and Timing
content.description: Understand how the frame rate affects the smoothness of your animation and how timing can influence the perception of movement.

content.title: Storyboarding
content.description: Discover the importance of storyboarding in planning out your animations, ensuring a coherent and engaging story.

content.title: Adobe Creative Cloud
content.description: Adobe Animate or After Effects - Cost: $19 per month

content.title: Procreate Dream
content.description: (iOS only) - Cost: $22 (One-time Purchase)

content.title: Pencil2D
content.description: Cost: Free

content.title: Character Design and Rigging
content.description: Learn how to create compelling character designs and rig them for smooth animation.

content.title: Keyframes and In-betweens
content.description: Understand the importance of keyframes in defining motion and how to create in-between frames for fluid transitions.

content.title: Lip Sync and Facial Expressions
content.description: Master the techniques for syncing lip movements to dialogue and animating expressive facial features.

typography.title: Typography Roadmap
typography.description: Welcome to the Typography Roadmap! This guide will take you through the essentials of typography, from basic principles to advanced techniques. You’ll learn to create captivating typography, whether you’re interested in print or digital media. Each section includes recommended tools and sources of inspiration to help you along your journey.

content.title: Principles of Typography
content.description: Learn the key principles of typography, such as alignment, hierarchy, and spacing. These principles will help you create more readable and aesthetically pleasing text.

content.title: Typefaces and Fonts
content.description: Understand the differences between typefaces and fonts, and how to choose the right ones for your project.

content.title: Text Composition
content.description: Discover the importance of text composition in creating a visually appealing and coherent design.

content.title: Adobe Creative Cloud
content.description: Adobe Illustrator or InDesign - Cost: $19 per month

content.title: Google Fonts
content.description: Free library of fonts

content.title: FontSquirrel
content.description: Free fonts for commercial use

content.title: Kerning and Leading
content.description: Learn how to adjust the space between characters and lines to improve readability and visual appeal.

content.title: Responsive Typography
content.description: Understand how to create typography that looks great on all devices, from mobile to desktop.

content.title: Advanced Text Effects
content.description: Master techniques for creating eye-catching text effects, such as shadows, gradients, and textures.

illustration.title: Illustration Roadmap
illustration.description: Welcome to the Illustration Roadmap! This guide will take you through the essentials of illustration, from basic principles to advanced techniques. You’ll learn to create captivating illustrations, whether you’re interested in traditional or digital media. Each section includes recommended tools and sources of inspiration to help you along your journey.

content.title: Principles of Illustration
content.description: Learn the key principles of illustration, such as composition, perspective, and color theory. These principles will help you create more engaging and visually appealing illustrations.

content.title: Sketching Techniques
content.description: Understand different sketching techniques and how to apply them in your work.

content.title: Character Design
content.description: Discover the importance of character design and how to create memorable and dynamic characters.

content.title: Adobe Creative Cloud
content.description: Adobe Photoshop or Illustrator - Cost: $19 per month

content.title: Procreate
content.description: (iOS only) - Cost: $9.99 (One-time Purchase)

content.title: Krita
content.description: Cost: Free

content.title: Digital Painting
content.description: Learn how to use digital painting techniques to create stunning illustrations.

content.title: Inking and Coloring
content.description: Understand the process of inking and coloring your illustrations to bring them to life.

content.title: Storytelling
content.description: Master the art of visual storytelling to create illustrations that tell a story and engage the audience.

web.title: Web Development Roadmap
web.description: Welcome to the Web Development Roadmap! This guide will take you through the essentials of web development, from basic principles to advanced techniques. You’ll learn to create responsive and dynamic websites, whether you're interested in front-end or back-end development. Each section includes recommended tools and sources of inspiration to help you along your journey.

content.title: HTML & CSS
content.description: Learn the fundamentals of HTML and CSS to create static web pages.

content.title: JavaScript
content.description: Understand the basics of JavaScript to add interactivity to your web pages.

content.title: Responsive Design
content.description: Discover the principles of responsive design to create web pages that look great on all devices.

content.title: Code Editors
content.description: Popular code editors like VS Code, Sublime Text, and Atom.

content.title: Version Control
content.description: Learn Git for version control and collaboration.

content.title: CSS Frameworks
content.description: Explore CSS frameworks like Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS.

content.title: JavaScript Frameworks
content.description: Learn popular JavaScript frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.

content.title: Backend Development
content.description: Understand backend development with Node.js, Express, and databases.

content.title: Deployment
content.description: Master the process of deploying web applications using platforms like Netlify, Vercel, and Heroku.

design.title: 3D Design Roadmap
design.description: Welcome to the 3D Design Roadmap! This guide will take you through the essentials of 3D design, from basic principles to advanced techniques. You’ll learn to create stunning 3D models, whether you're interested in animation, game design, or product visualization. Each section includes recommended tools and sources of inspiration to help you along your journey.

content.title: 3D Modeling
content.description: Learn the basics of 3D modeling to create simple 3D objects.

content.title: Texturing
content.description: Understand the process of adding textures to your 3D models.

content.title: Rendering
content.description: Discover the principles of rendering to create photorealistic images of your 3D models.

content.title: Blender
content.description: A powerful and free 3D modeling software.

content.title: ZBrush
content.description: An advanced tool for sculpting high-resolution 3D models.

content.title: Substance Painter
content.description: A tool for painting textures directly onto your 3D models.

content.title: Character Modeling
content.description: Learn how to model detailed and realistic 3D characters.

content.title: Animation
content.description: Understand the basics of 3D animation to bring your models to life.

content.title: Game Design
content.description: Master the techniques for creating 3D assets for games.

design_types.title: Stumped? Get started with learning these design types.
